sentence.Network_en: Each of its teak - paneled villas comes with butler service, a private infinity pool and a gazebo.

list.abs: gawk at it in the town gazebo .在城镇的凉亭里呆呆的看着它。

finally , build the big gazebo that when buying a house , gives room of a party .最后，把买房时赠予的大露台建成一个聚会场所。

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 18th cent.: perhaps humorously from gaze, in imitation of Latin future tenses ending in -ebo: compare with lavabo

entry.def: A gazebo is a small building with open sides. Gazebos are often put up in gardens so that people can sit in them to enjoy the view.

means.word_mean: 1. a small roofed building affording shade and rest

auth_sentence.content: There was a little town square with a gazebo and a Civil War cannon.
